items.value: Click on the game elements to get information about them!
YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE LOST! ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO QUIT?
YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE LOST! ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO START OVER?
You lose lives when pathogenic bacteria reach the blood vessels on the left of the screen.
As you use antibiotics the resistance bar fills up and pathogenic bacteria become resistant.
As you use antibiotics the resistance bar fills up and pathogenic bacteria become resistant.
The Wave bar fills up after each wave of pathogenic bacteria.
The Wave bar fills up after each wave of pathogenic bacteria.
This is the money you can spend on antibiotics.
This is the remaining time before the next wave, if the current wave is dead.
You must kill all the pathogenic bacteria before this timer reaches zero.
Use this button to pause the game.
Use this button to start over this level.
Click here to give us some feedback on the game.
Upgrade your antibiotics to kill more pathogenic bacteria!
Sell your antibiotics to get money and reduce the resistance.
Pay to make the antibiotics last longer.
This is a pathogenic bacterium! Use antibiotics to kill it as soon as possible!
This is an antibiotics dispenser. It attacks pathogenic bacteria using antibiotics.
Click this button to place antibiotics dispensers on the tiles!
This is a red blood cell, minding its own business of oxygen transport.
This is a white blood cell, ready to defend the blood vessel from intruders!
SARS-CoV-2 is unaffected by antibiotics, like all viruses. Let white blood cells kill it!
This is an antibiotics bullet. You're a very quick clicker!
Quick! You must set up antibiotics dispensers to destroy incoming pathogenic bacteria!
Click on the antibiotic dispenser button to start setting them up.
Beware! The more you use antibiotics, the more pathogenic bacteria get resistant to them!
Beware! The resistance level is so high that antibiotics have almost no effect anymore!
Beware! You'll lose if you finish the level with more than 50% resistance!
This is the last wave. Kill all the pathogenic bacteria to unlock the next level!
Watch out! A pathogenic bacterium has escaped. You'll lose if this counter reaches zero!
A White Blood Cell (WBC) killed a pathogen. You only have a few WBCs in backup...
Watch out! A pathogenic bacterium just divided! Kill it or it'll go on dividing!
You can upgrade your antibiotics dispensers if you have enough funds. Click on them!
Use this button to discover how the game works: click it then click on game elements!
You can sell your dispenser if you wish. But you won't recover all the cash!
This is the countdown to the next wave of pathogenic bacteria. Brace yourself!
Tuberculosis bacteria are trying to colonize the lungs!
You have a limited time to rid the lungs of these pathogenic bacteria. Act now!
Alarm!! Viruses of the COVID disease have been detected!
Only White Blood Cells can fight viruses, antibiotics can't kill them!
Viruses of the COVID disease will try and infect the lung cells!
Infected lung cells produce new viruses, then die or recover slowly from the infection.
Opportunistic bacteria will try to benefit from the chaos... Beware, fight them!
At last, reinforcements! Bacteria and viruses are almost defeated!
